name: Social Distancing (Cyberq)
description:
SOCIAL DISTANCING

Player "Adam" is Lost in this Pandemic World 

Can you Save Adam from Infection by giving him immunity? 

Player have to Keep him away from infected people in the area 

Game is Made for "GAME JAM 2020 AD" Of Theme As "2020" Controls 

Spacebar for Changing the perspective of the game 

Use Mouse for Drag and Drop 4 Pieces which are "2", "0", "2", "0" in the play area

Each Pieces has a changeable direction that can be changed by pressing "C" while Holding

More about the game

>The player can place the pieces at any point in the time if the player changes his mind 

>Player can go through green areas for more immunity and avoid infected people for immunity loss

>Levels are Randomly generated with a new Immunity Aim to beat for each level

>Press "R" to play a new level 

The Game is "Place and Play Game" which means the game plays itself after placing things in the game 

There are minor bugs in the game, they will be fixed in future updates of the game 

This is just a concept of an idea I hope you guys have fun playing the game :)

Team
